citations.narrative:
In approximately 8 enclosures housing approximately 22 dogs there was an excess build up of feces inside the outdoor
portion of the enclosures. The licensee acknowledged the enclosures were dirty and due to the recent extreme cold
conditions, the help didn't clean the outside well.
A build up of feces is a disease hazard and can attract pests. The licensee must ensure all surfaces which come in
contact with the dogs and puppies are spot cleaned daily.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
In approximately 8 enclosures housing approximately 22 dogs there was an excess build up of feces inside the outdoor 
portion of the enclosures. The licensee acknowledged the enclosures were dirty and due to the recent extreme cold 
conditions, the help didn't clean the outside well.  
A build up of feces is a disease hazard and can attract pests. The licensee must ensure all surfaces which come in 
contact with the dogs and puppies are spot cleaned daily. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
